page.title: 18Population in Skegness
page.content: We asked some people in the street a few questions and these are the results. About nine out of ten were visitors to the area. They came from places like Leicester and Chesterfield. Most people were staying in caravan sites. Most people liked walking around and going swimming. Some people said that Skegness needed more buses and more seats to sit on for the elderly people. Winthorpe is much quieter in the closed season from October to May. Many holiday businesses are closed down and there are fewer people around. Those you meet then are likely to be locals. Many will be unemployed during the winter and do seasonal work in the summer.
